title: PMS 2.0 569 - College Football Playoff Preview With Kirk Herbstreit, Bear Fallica, & Lee Corso, Shane Beamer, & NFL Week 17 Preview With AJ Hawk
description: On today's special edition of the show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys preview both College Football Playoff semifinal games with Kirk Herbstreit, Bear Fallica, and Lee Corso, how both those games are going to be played, and what Herby's biggest takeaway from 2021 was. Also joining the show is the Head Football Coach of the South Carolina Gamecocks and recent champion of the Duke's Mayo Bowl, Shane Beamer. Pat, Shane, and AJ chat about his career thus far, how he's had to adapt to NIL with recruiting, the state of his program, and much more. Later, Pat and AJ go through the entire week 17 NFL slate and make their picks against the spread as we have some very intriguing matchups, several of which have heavy playoff implications. We can't thank you enough for joining us this year and following along, we appreciate the hell out of you all. Be safe and have an incredible New Years Eve and New Year, we'll see you on Overreaction Monday. Cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
